name: LolCat Kingdom

You will get to be a civilization of cats which mutated and become a little bigger and stronger but the scariest thing they become smarter. Like humans, They rised from the ashes to capture human kind. Why you ask? Because they killed a lot of creatures and that is worst thing what anyone could do. peace of lore By the way the Cats don't annex or create genoside, they just want to rule the world only because humans dfinitely worst rulers.
startIntroPart2: You are mighty leader of The Cats. Lead them to victory. Or else you gonna be defeated. And That what you don't want to do!

In this battle we deside hoo gona be the best if I win you wil join my empire empire of mighty Lolcat. If you wonder who is Lolcat it's the powest cat in the world he was able to fight what we now call mutants
